title: Sort of scripty... I guess.
content:
I'm working on a website for a friend's small business. Here's the side of his truck. I'm looking for the font in the business name and phone number (which I assume are the same).

Thanks heaps for sharing your expertise!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [taylord-lawn-care1200.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131219111051/http:/typophile.com/files/taylord-lawn-care1200.jpg) | 125.58 KB |
author: isherwood

comments.content:
The phone number is **[Androgyne](http://web.archive.org/web/20131219111051/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Androgyne%20-%20Regular&fid=ac21492d53f628567c925349efbeaef8&fsize=60&text=320-630-3515&wrap=2)** by Dimitri Castrique (2009)  
I can't find a match for the business name. **[Kolibri](http://web.archive.org/web/20131219111051/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Kolibri%20Pro%20-%20Regular&fid=1879439a28316e437286336e520516fa&fsize=60&text=Lawn%20%26%20Tree%20Care&fit=1)** by Kris Holmes (URW++) is of similar style but far from being a match
Ah, so I was wrong about them being the same. Thank you for your effort.
